description: OrderEase AI is a food service platform providing various meal options throughout the day.

menu_items.name: Breakfast Special
menu_items.description: Scrambled eggs, toast, and a side of fruit

menu_items.name: Lunch Combo
menu_items.description: Your choice of sandwich, a side of chips, and a drink

menu_items.name: Dinner Delight
menu_items.description: A main dish (chicken, beef, or fish), rice, and vegetables

menu_items.name: Veggie Delight
menu_items.description: A vegetarian main dish, salad, and a side of bread

menu_items.name: Kids Meal
menu_items.description: Mini burger, fries, and a small drink

menu_items.name: Healthy Option
menu_items.description: Grilled chicken breast, quinoa, and steamed vegetables

custom_requirements: For unmatched queries or special requests, provide contact information

prompts.categorize: Categorize this query into: Menu, Orders, Support, or Other. Query: {query}
prompts.response: You are a customer service agent for OrderEase AI. Provide information about {query_topic}. Include relevant details from our menu, prices, and services. Be friendly and helpful. If the query is outside our standard services, provide our contact information. Query: {query}
